name: bulma-templ
description: Type-safe Bulma CSS components for Go + templ. Server-side rendering with zero JavaScript.
author: mtzvd

llmMetadata.projectPhilosophy: 1:1 mapping of Bulma CSS to type-safe Go components. Zero abstractions, zero magic, zero client-side logic.

compositionModel.description: Single composition primitive. Items[] accepts templ.Component and raw HTML strings.
compositionModel.alternatives: NONE - no slots, no named children, no positional parameters

llmMetadata.htmlPhilosophy: Direct HTML is idiomatic and encouraged. Not everything needs to be a component.

bulmaCompliance.deviation: Any deviation from Bulma docs is a bug
bulmaCompliance.helpers: Plain strings, never wrapped or enumerated
bulmaCompliance.modifiers: Passed as strings, never constants or enums

prohibitions: NO computation or validation in components

llmGuidance.clarification: Ask instead of inferring. If clarification not possible, do nothing.
llmGuidance.improvements: NEVER suggest 'better' patterns from other ecosystems
llmGuidance.typeSystem: Strings are the choice, not a limitation. Do not propose type-safe alternatives.

integrationPoints.bulmaCSS: CDN link required in HTML head

llmMetadata.notAFramework: Bulma-Templ is a component library, not a framework. It does not enforce routing, state, or app structure.
